purpleculture_pinyin:
juàn
variant of 眷 ; to care about; to look fondly on; concern; wife and children
вариант 眷; заботиться о; смотреть с любовью; беспокойство; жена и дети
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 睠)
Pictophonetic: 龹 indicates the sound; 目 (eye) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
眷恋 [ juàn liàn ]: to miss; to long for; to remember with longing; yearning
眷属 [ juàn shǔ ]: family member; husband and wife
家眷 [ jiā juàn ]: one's wife and children
眷念 [ juàn niàn ]: to think fondly of
眷顾 [ juàn gù ]: to care for; to show concern for; to think longingly (of one's country)

heisig_chinese_memo: If you have four dependents (children in this story) you need to direct your eyes to each one for a quarter of the time.

humanum_full_description_en:
From the " head ", the sound of " shun ", the original meaning is looking back and looking back. "Said Wen": "Gu Ye. From the eyes, the snoring sound. "The Poetry" says: I care about the west." "Poetry‧Daya‧The Emperor": "I care about the west, this dimension and the house."

" Satisfaction " can mean care and concern. Jin Panyue "Waiting forever and passing away": "I want to be lonely in the old world, and see it suddenly.

" Kan " also means graciousness and favor. Three Kingdoms Wei Yingzhu "Book with Mangongyan": "The former Housheng took care of the Yimen, and Mao was favored by the rebellious journey. There is no way to go."

" King " also expresses love and attachment. Tang Hanxi "Li Taishe's Pond Playing Red Wei Drunk Questions": "You can't shame the white temple with Motin, you can still care about Hongying."

" Dependents " can also refer to relatives, families. "New History of the Five Dynasties‧ Miscellaneous Biography Nineteen‧ Pei Hao": "The Pei family has been a clan since the Jin and Wei dynasties, and the name of the person living in the swallow is "Dongjuan", the person living in Liang is "Xijuan" and the person living in Hedong is " Zhongjuan."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " head " and " snake " sound, the original meaning is looking back and looking back.
humanum_full_description:
從「目」，「龹」聲，本義為回視、返顧。《說文》：「顧也。从目，龹聲。《詩》曰：乃眷西顧。」《詩‧大雅‧皇矣》：「乃眷西顧，此維與宅。」

　　「眷」可表示顧念、關注。晉潘岳〈哀永逝文〉：「想孤魂兮眷舊宇，視倏忽兮若髣彿。」

　　「眷」也表示恩遇、恩寵。三國魏應璩〈與滿公琰書〉：「昔侯生納顧於夷門，毛公受眷於逆旅，無以過也。」

　　「眷」還表示垂愛、依戀。唐韓偓〈李太舍池上玩紅薇醉題〉：「酩酊不能羞白鬢，顛狂猶自睠紅英。」

　　「眷」還可指親屬、家屬。《新五代史‧雜傳十九‧裴皞》：「裴氏自晉魏以來，世為名族，居燕者號『東眷』，居涼者號『西眷』，居河東者號『中眷』。」
humanum_short_description: 從「目」，「龹」聲，本義為回視、返顧。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
眷 (Trad.: 睠)
Pinyin: juàn
English Definition: variant of 眷 ; to care about; to look fondly on; concern; wife and children
Total strokes: 11; Radical: 目
Pictophonetic: 龹 indicates the sound; 目 (eye) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 龹 [ quǎn ] Form of 卷 used as a phonetic component
    • 目 [ mù ] eye; to look, to see; division, topic
Step by Step Stroke Sequence: Download Customize Pin it

眷属 [ juàn shǔ ]: family member; husband and wife
家眷 [ jiā juàn ]: one's wife and children
眷念 [ juàn niàn ]: to think fondly of
眷顾 [ juàn gù ]: to care for; to show concern for; to think longingly (of one's country)

從「 目 」，「 龹 」聲，本義為回視、返顧。《說文》：「顧也。从目，龹聲。《詩》曰：乃眷西顧。」《詩‧大雅‧皇矣》：「乃眷西顧，此維與宅。」 「 眷 」可表示顧念、關注。晉潘岳〈哀永逝文〉：「想孤魂兮眷舊宇，視倏忽兮若髣彿。」 「 眷 」也表示恩遇、恩寵。三國魏應璩〈與滿公琰書〉：「昔侯生納顧於夷門，毛公受眷於逆旅，無以過也。」 「 眷 」還表示垂愛、依戀。唐韓偓〈李太舍池上玩紅薇醉題〉：「酩酊不能羞白鬢，顛狂猶自睠紅英。」 「 眷 」還可指親屬、家屬。《新五代史‧雜傳十九‧裴皞》：「裴氏自晉魏以來，世為名族，居燕者號『東眷』，居涼者號『西眷』，居河東者號『中眷』。」

眷字的基本解释

眷
juàn
顾念，爱恋：眷念。眷恋。眷顾。眷注（爱护关注）。眷眷（依恋的样子）。
亲属：亲眷。女眷。眷属。

眷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［juàn］
［《廣韻》居倦切，去線，見。］
“婘2”的被通假字。亦作“睠1”。
(1)回视；返顾。
(2)恩遇；恩宠。
(3)顾念；关注。
(4)垂爱；依恋。
(5)亲属；家属。

眷字的英文翻译

◎ 眷
family dependant, have tender feelings for

眷字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　眷； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页807第04
【唐韻】居倦切【集韻】【韻會】古倦切【正韻】吉掾切，?音卷。【說文】顧也。【博雅】嚮也。又回視也。【書·大禹謨】皇天眷命。　又與睠通。【詩·小雅】睠睠懷顧。【韓詩】作眷眷，勤厚之意也。又【大雅】乃眷西顧。【箋】眷，本又作睠。　又親屬也。【五代史·裴皞傳】裴氏自晉魏以來，世爲名族。居燕省者，號東眷。居涼者，號西眷。居河東者，號中眷。　又或作婘。【史記·樊噲傳】誅諸呂婘屬。　又姓。見【姓苑】。又茂眷，代北複姓。又壹斗眷，代北三字姓。　【集韻】亦作?。

眷字的源字形

眷字的起名意思

本义是指回头看，如眷，顾也（《说文》）。后引申为恩顾，器重，思慕，眷恋等。

【Lunch Concentration】【Head Word Department】　juan; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 807 04
[Tang Yun] Jujuan cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Ancient Jun cut [Zheng Yun] Jiju cut,? Sound volume. [Said Wen] Gu Ye. [Bo Ya] Xiang Ye. Looking back again. 【Book·Dayumo】The emperor's fate.　 And again with the family. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Favor and care. [Han Poem] Being a family member, it means diligence. Also 【Daya】I care about the west. [J] Family, Ben is a family again.　Also relatives. [Five Dynasties History·Pei Hao Biography] The Pei clan has been a clan since the Jin and Wei dynasties. Those who live in Yan Province are called Dongjuan. Those who live in the cold are the Western dependents. Those who live in Hedong are the family members.　Or as a 婘. 【Historical Records·Fan Kuai Biography】Zhu Zhulu Luan belonged to the genus.　Another last name. See [surname court]. And Maojuan, on behalf of the North Fu surname. Another family member, on behalf of the northern three-character surname.　【Jiyun】also made?.
concern
Source glyph
concern
Name meaning
The original meaning refers to looking back, Ru Jia, Gu Ye ("Shu Wen"). Later it is extended to be gracious, respectful, yearning, sentimental and so on.
眷
形声字。目表意,表示用目(眼睛)看;类(juan )表声,兴指双手将米饭反复捏成饭团,表示眷是反复地回头看。本义
是回头看。引申为关心、怀念。
①关心;怀念:~顾」~念「~恋。②亲属:~属「亲~|

春眷
隶
беспокойство
Пиктофонетические символы.
Значение глаза означает видеть глазами (глазами); звук цзюань означает, что обе руки многократно сжимают рис в рисовые шарики, что означает, что семья постоянно оглядывается назад.
Первоначальный смысл - оглянуться назад.
Расширение - это забота и память.
①Забота; Ностальгия: ~ Гу "~ Чтение" ~ Любовь. ②Семья: ~ принадлежность к "родственнику ~ | дому ~."
